argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | distps.a | |- A e. _V |
| 2 |  | distps.k | |- K = { <. ( Base ` ndx ) , A >. , <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ~P A >. } |
| 3 |  | #P_unipw | |- U. ~P A = A |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eqcomi | |- A = U. ~P A |
| 5 |  | #P_distop | |- ( A e. _V -> ~P A e. Top ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_ax-mp | |- ~P A e. Top |
| 7 | 2, 4, 6 | #P_eltpsi | |- K e. TopSp |
